title: S4 E2 Chaplain (MAJ) Jeff Struecker - Rangers, Somalia, and Faith
description:
Retired Chaplain Jeff Struecker recounts his experiences during Gothic Serpent, the military operation depicted in the film "Blackhawk Down". He and fellow members of Task Force Ranger endured some of the most intense and brutal fighting since Vietnam, suffered terrible loss, but ultimately proved to the world the strength of it's SOF members and why Rangers Lead the Way!

Subscribe Today!
itunes:author: US Special Operations Command
